channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Ultimate Blocks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Ultimate Blocks

item.title: CVE-2024-3241|2024-05-14T06:00:02.064Z -- Unknown -- Ultimate Blocks
item.description: The Ultimate Blocks WordPress plugin before 3.1.7 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
